title: Über Vintaro - AI & Accessibility made in Austria
description: Wir entwickeln KI-Lösungen und barrierefreie Websites, die funktionieren. DSGVO-konform, nutzerfreundlich, messbar.
body:
const{Fragment:e,jsx:n,jsxs:r}=arguments[0];function _createMdxContent(i){const a={a:"a",h1:"h1",h2:"h2",h3:"h3",p:"p",...i.components};return r(e,{children:[n(a.h1,{id:"über-vintaro",children:n(a.a,{className:"anchor",href:"#über-vintaro",children:"Über Vintaro"})}),"
",n(a.h2,{id:"vision",children:n(a.a,{className:"anchor",href:"#vision",children:"Vision"})}),"
",n(a.p,{children:"Technologie soll Menschen verbinden, nicht ausschließen. Wir glauben an AI, die entlastet, und Websites, die für alle zugänglich sind."}),"
",n(a.h2,{id:"mission",children:n(a.a,{className:"anchor",href:"#mission",children:"Mission"})}),"
",n(a.p,{children:"Wir machen fortschrittliche Technologie für mittelständische Unternehmen nutzbar - ohne Vendor-Lock-in, ohne endlose Projekte, ohne leere Versprechen."}),"
",n(a.h2,{id:"werte",children:n(a.a,{className:"anchor",href:"#werte",children:"Werte"})}),"
",n(a.h3,{id:"transparenz",children:n(a.a,{className:"anchor",href:"#transparenz",children:"Transparenz"})}),"
",n(a.p,{children:"Klare Preise, realistische Timelines, ehrliche KPIs. Keine Marketing-Luft."}),"
",n(a.h3,{id:"pragmatismus",children:n(a.a,{className:"anchor",href:"#pragmatismus",children:"Pragmatismus"})}),"
",n(a.p,{children:"Wir lösen Probleme, keine Theorien. MVPs in Wochen, nicht Monaten."}),"
",n(a.h3,{id:"accessibility-first",children:n(a.a,{className:"anchor",href:"#accessibility-first",children:"Accessibility First"})}),"
",n(a.p,{children:"Barrierefreiheit ist nicht optional. WCAG 2.2 AA ist unser Mindeststandard."}),"
",n(a.h3,{id:"datenschutz-by-design",children:n(a.a,{className:"anchor",href:"#datenschutz-by-design",children:"Datenschutz by Design"})}),"
",n(a.p,{children:"DSGVO-Compliance von Anfang an. EU-Hosting, transparente Datenverarbeitung."}),"
",n(a.h2,{id:"warum-vintaro",children:n(a.a,{className:"anchor",href:"#warum-vintaro",children:"Warum Vintaro?"})}),"
",n(a.h3,{id:"1-österreich-fokus",children:n(a.a,{className:"anchor",href:"#1-österreich-fokus",children:"1. Österreich-Fokus"})}),"
",n(a.p,{children:"Wir verstehen lokale Anforderungen: DSG, DSB, Auftraggeberschutzgesetz. Deutsche Unternehmen profitieren von unserer DSGVO-Expertise."}),"
",n(a.h3,{id:"2-kein-vendor-lock-in",children:n(a.a,{className:"anchor",href:"#2-kein-vendor-lock-in",children:"2. Kein Vendor-Lock-in"})}),"
",n(a.p,{children:"Open Standards, exportierbare Daten, transparente APIs. Sie behalten Kontrolle."}),"
",n(a.h3,{id:"3-messbare-ergebnisse",children:n(a.a,{className:"anchor",href:"#3-messbare-ergebnisse",children:"3. Messbare Ergebnisse"})}),"
",n(a.p,{children:"30-Tage-Pilots mit klaren KPIs. Keine Zahlung ohne nachweisbaren Mehrwert."}),"
",n(a.h3,{id:"4-accessibility-expertise",children:n(a.a,{className:"anchor",href:"#4-accessibility-expertise",children:"4. Accessibility-Expertise"})}),"
",n(a.p,{children:"Zertifizierte WCAG-Auditoren. Wir kennen BITV 2.0, EN 301 549, EAA 2025."}),"
",n(a.h2,{id:"timeline",children:n(a.a,{className:"anchor",href:"#timeline",children:"Timeline"})}),"
",n(a.h3,{id:"2024-gründung",children:n(a.a,{className:"anchor",href:"#2024-gründung",children:"2024: Gründung"})}),"
",n(a.p,{children:"Start mit Fokus auf AI-Agenten und WCAG-Consulting für öffentliche Verwaltung."}),"
",n(a.h3,{id:"2025-expansion",children:n(a.a,{className:"anchor",href:"#2025-expansion",children:"2025: Expansion"})}),"
",n(a.p,{children:"Erste Enterprise-Kunden, Partnerschaft mit österreichischen Rechenzentren."}),"
",n(a.h3,{id:"2026-roadmap-produktisierung",children:n(a.a,{className:"anchor",href:"#2026-roadmap-produktisierung",children:"2026 (Roadmap): Produktisierung"})}),"
",n(a.p,{children:"SaaS-Plattform für AI-Agenten, Self-Service-Tools für WCAG-Compliance."}),"
",n(a.p,{children:n(a.a,{href:"#contact",children:"Jetzt Kennenlerngespräch vereinbaren"})})]})}return{default:function(e={}){const{wrapper:r}=e.components||{};return r?n(r,{...e,children:n(_createMdxContent,{...e})}):_createMdxContent(e)}};

title: About Vintaro - AI & Accessibility made in Austria
description: We develop AI solutions and accessible websites that work. GDPR-compliant, user-friendly, measurable.
body:
const{Fragment:e,jsx:n,jsxs:i}=arguments[0];function _createMdxContent(r){const a={a:"a",h1:"h1",h2:"h2",h3:"h3",p:"p",...r.components};return i(e,{children:[n(a.h1,{id:"about-vintaro",children:n(a.a,{className:"anchor",href:"#about-vintaro",children:"About Vintaro"})}),"
",n(a.h2,{id:"vision",children:n(a.a,{className:"anchor",href:"#vision",children:"Vision"})}),"
",n(a.p,{children:"Technology should connect people, not exclude them. We believe in AI that relieves burden, and websites accessible to all."}),"
",n(a.h2,{id:"mission",children:n(a.a,{className:"anchor",href:"#mission",children:"Mission"})}),"
",n(a.p,{children:"We make advanced technology usable for mid-sized companies - without vendor lock-in, endless projects, or empty promises."}),"
",n(a.h2,{id:"values",children:n(a.a,{className:"anchor",href:"#values",children:"Values"})}),"
",n(a.h3,{id:"transparency",children:n(a.a,{className:"anchor",href:"#transparency",children:"Transparency"})}),"
",n(a.p,{children:"Clear prices, realistic timelines, honest KPIs. No marketing fluff."}),"
",n(a.h3,{id:"pragmatism",children:n(a.a,{className:"anchor",href:"#pragmatism",children:"Pragmatism"})}),"
",n(a.p,{children:"We solve problems, not theories. MVPs in weeks, not months."}),"
",n(a.h3,{id:"accessibility-first",children:n(a.a,{className:"anchor",href:"#accessibility-first",children:"Accessibility First"})}),"
",n(a.p,{children:"Accessibility is not optional. WCAG 2.2 AA is our minimum standard."}),"
",n(a.h3,{id:"privacy-by-design",children:n(a.a,{className:"anchor",href:"#privacy-by-design",children:"Privacy by Design"})}),"
",n(a.p,{children:"GDPR compliance from day one. EU hosting, transparent data processing."}),"
",n(a.h2,{id:"why-vintaro",children:n(a.a,{className:"anchor",href:"#why-vintaro",children:"Why Vintaro?"})}),"
",n(a.h3,{id:"1-austria-focus",children:n(a.a,{className:"anchor",href:"#1-austria-focus",children:"1. Austria Focus"})}),"
",n(a.p,{children:"We understand local requirements: DSG, DSB, public procurement law. German companies benefit from our GDPR expertise."}),"
",n(a.h3,{id:"2-no-vendor-lock-in",children:n(a.a,{className:"anchor",href:"#2-no-vendor-lock-in",children:"2. No Vendor Lock-in"})}),"
",n(a.p,{children:"Open standards, exportable data, transparent APIs. You retain control."}),"
",n(a.h3,{id:"3-measurable-results",children:n(a.a,{className:"anchor",href:"#3-measurable-results",children:"3. Measurable Results"})}),"
",n(a.p,{children:"30-day pilots with clear KPIs. No payment without proven value."}),"
",n(a.h3,{id:"4-accessibility-expertise",children:n(a.a,{className:"anchor",href:"#4-accessibility-expertise",children:"4. Accessibility Expertise"})}),"
",n(a.p,{children:"Certified WCAG auditors. We know BITV 2.0, EN 301 549, EAA 2025."}),"
",n(a.h2,{id:"timeline",children:n(a.a,{className:"anchor",href:"#timeline",children:"Timeline"})}),"
",n(a.h3,{id:"2024-founded",children:n(a.a,{className:"anchor",href:"#2024-founded",children:"2024: Founded"})}),"
",n(a.p,{children:"Start with focus on AI agents and WCAG consulting for public administration."}),"
",n(a.h3,{id:"2025-expansion",children:n(a.a,{className:"anchor",href:"#2025-expansion",children:"2025: Expansion"})}),"
",n(a.p,{children:"First enterprise customers, partnership with Austrian data centers."}),"
",n(a.h3,{id:"2026-roadmap-productization",children:n(a.a,{className:"anchor",href:"#2026-roadmap-productization",children:"2026 (Roadmap): Productization"})}),"
",n(a.p,{children:"SaaS platform for AI agents, self-service tools for WCAG compliance."}),"
",n(a.p,{children:n(a.a,{href:"#contact",children:"Schedule Introduction Call"})})]})}return{default:function(e={}){const{wrapper:i}=e.components||{};return i?n(i,{...e,children:n(_createMdxContent,{...e})}):_createMdxContent(e)}};
